div.head: 腰溶溶如坐水中
div.div: flabby lower back as if one were sitting in water

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Yao rong rong ru zuo shui zhong

entry.def: flabby lower back as if one were sitting in water

sense.def: Illness Sign of flabbiness and weakness in one’s lower back accompanied by a feeling of cold. Nan jing 難經 29: 帶之為病，腹滿，腰溶溶若坐水中 , “When the belt [vessel] has an illness, the abdomen feels full and [patients] suffer from a flabby lower back as if they were sitting in water ”.
